item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network 2014
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of programming languages based on their influences with language and language paradigm highlighting rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: Exploring Movie Body Counts
item.description: A look at movie body counts based on information from the Website Movie Body Counts, a forum where users collect on-screen body counts for a selection of films and the characters and actors who appear in these films.

item.title: Top 1% Income Share in Different Countries
item.description: A quick dive into the World Top Incomes Database compiled and maintained by Facundo Alvaredo, Tony Atkinson, Thomas Piketty and Emmanuel Saez.

item.title: Falcao and Iniesta the top players in 2013 according to Ronaldo and Messi
item.description: The Ballon d'Or 2013 visualization shows an interactive network graph of voters and voted football players related based on votes cast for the male FIFA Ballon d'Or award in 2013.

item.title: Ballon d'Or 2013 Male Players Votes Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections between voters and voted male football players from the male FIFA Ballon d'Or vote 2013.

item.title: Where in the World Happen Most Murders
item.description: A series of maps of the world showing where in the world the least and the most murders happen for the years 1995 to 2011.

item.title: World Map of Intentional Homicides
item.description: A series of geographic Choropleth maps showing the number of intentional homicides by country per 100,000 people. Created using World Bank data and D3.js.

item.title: Rail Suicides in Europe: Absolute vs. Relative
item.description: A look at rail suicides data for Europe from 2008 to 2011 highlighting the importance of relating numbers.

item.title: How npm Packages are Linked by Dependencies
item.description: 2 Interactive graph visualizations that show how npm packages are linked by dependency relations, the smaller one is limited to packages with at least 10 dependent packages. Graphs were pre-processed with Gephi and are rendered with sigma.js.

item.title: npm Top Packages Dependencies Graph
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the dependencies between npm packages, with at least 10 dependent packages, as of July 12, 2013 rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: npm Packages Dependencies Graph
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the dependencies between npm packages as of July 12, 2013 rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: Geo Maps Drawn from IP Locations
item.description: Geographic maps of the world and most continents drawn based on an IP location dataset with 419433 records.

item.title: How Participants of the Visualisingdata Census are Connected on Twitter
item.description: The visualisingdata census network graph shows the Twitter connections of the participants of the 1st data visualization census initiated by Andy Kirk.

item.title: Visualisingdata Census Twitter Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of Twitter users who participated in the 1st data visualization census initiated by Andy Kirk, rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: A Decade of Climate Change in the Guardian
item.description: Explore a decade of climate change, global warming, natural disaster, extreme weather, pollution and deforestation in the articles published by the Guardian.

item.title: Footballers Search Relations Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the relations of footballers based on Google searches as shown in knowledge graph information.

item.title: How Footballers Relate based on Google Searches
item.description: The footballers search relations visualization shows a network graph of former and current football players and managers related by Google searches with results containing knowledge graph information.

item.title: Programmers Search Relations Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the relations of programmers based on Google searches as shown in knowledge graph information.

item.title: How Programmers Relate based on Google Searches
item.description: The programmers search relations visualization shows a network graph of programmers related by Google searches with results containing knowledge graph information.

item.title: Data Driven Journalism Books
item.description: Books about data journalism in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Creative Coding Books
item.description: Books about programmatic creation of data visualizations with D3, Python, Processing and SVG in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Data Mining and Analysis Books
item.description: Books about mining and analyzing data using statistics and programming tools in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Maps and Cartography Books
item.description: Books about maps and cartography in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Data Visualization Books
item.description: Books about data visualization in general, covering theory and practice of creating data visualizations in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Berlin Bike Routes Map
item.description: A map of Berlin, Germany showing 14 different biking routes through and around the city. Created with OpenLayers, Open Street Map and data from Senatsverwaltung für Stadtentwicklung und Umwelt.

item.title: A Map of Bike Routes in Berlin, Germany
item.description: The bike routes map for Berlin, Germany shows 14 different biking routes through and around the city. Created with OpenLayers, Open Street Map and data from Senatsverwaltung für Stadtentwicklung und Umwelt.

item.title: What Others Say
item.description: A selection of Tweets from people referring to Exploring Data on Twitter ordered by date of publication.

item.title: Search for Public Data on the Web
item.description: A Google custom search engine, that searches sites that host public data.

item.title: Ballon d'Or 2012 Votes Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections between voters and voted players from the male FIFA Ballon d'Or vote 2012.

item.title: Who Voted for Whom at Ballon d'Or 2012
item.description: The Ballon d'Or 2012 visualization shows an interactive network graph of voters and voted players related based on votes cast for the male FIFA Ballon d'Or award in 2012.

item.title: Evolution of Internet Users from 1990 - 2012
item.description: An animated scatterplot showing the evolution of Internet users across the worlds countries from 1990 to 2012 created with the D3.js.

item.title: See Why Spain Won Euro 2012
item.description: A data story about Spain's performance at the UEFA Euro 2012 including charts created with the Datawrapper visualization tool.

item.title: Real-Time World Map of Earthquakes
item.description: A geographic map of the world showing real-time data for recent earthquakes rendered with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: World Aid Flow, Transparency, Development
item.description: An interactive visualization looking at world aid flow, aid transparency, and development in receiving countries created with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: Which Software Platforms are Exploited the Most
item.description: A pack layout visualization of platforms sized by the number of exploits created with the JavaScript library D3 and data from the Exploit Database.

item.title: James Bond Actors Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of actors that appeared together in 23 James Bond movies including the latest in the series called Skyfall.

item.title: Relations of James Bond Film Actors based on Common Appearance
item.description: The James Bond Actors visualization is an interactive network graph showing the connections of actors who appeared together in 23 James Bond movies including the latest in the series called Skyfall.

item.title: Human Disease Network
item.description: An interactive network of disorders and disease genes linked by known disorder–gene associations based on the study The Human Disease Network, Goh K-I, Cusick ME, Valle D, Childs B, Vidal M, Barabási A-L (2007), Proc Natl Acad Sci USA 104:8685-8690.

item.title: A Network Graph of Human Diseases
item.description: The human disease network graph is a visualization based on a study that explored relations of diseases and human genes by Goh K-I, Cusick ME, Valle D, Childs B, Vidal M, Barabási A-L (2007).

item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of programming languages based on their influences with language and language paradigm highlighting rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: Visualizing Influence Relations of Programming Languages
item.description: The programming languages influence network is an interactive graph visualization where languages are connected by influence relations based on data from Freebase.

item.title: Data Mining and Data Visualization
item.description: Exploring Data is a showcase of interactive data visualizations comprising topics like world aid flow, climate change, programming languages, football, Google knowledge graph relations, and Twitter networks.

item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network D3
item.description: An network graph showing the connections of programming languages based on their influences created with the JavaScript library D3.
